BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 050305 HAK, an Urban Development Action Area Designation and Project tentatively known as Anchor – Broadway Site 8, located in Community Board 16, and the disposition of such property, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 41.  This matter is subject to Council Review and action pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter and Article 16 of the General Municipal Law.

C 050318 PQX, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter concerning the acquisition of property, located in Community Board 4, Borough of the Bronx, Council District no. 16.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
